Howto build and deploy the demo

- Prequisites

checkout source
https://mulertmp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/

extract

Red5 0.9.0 Final
http://www.red5.org/downloads/0_9/red5-0.9.0.zip

create lib-red5

move red5-0.9.0/lib and red5.jar to lib-red5 

retrieve BlazeDS 3.2.0.3948, Spring, Spring BlazeDS Integration and dependcies with Maven using the java/pom.xml file


- Building

compile java source java/source
flex sources in as3/source

or use mulertmp.jar file

- Deploying

deploy java/sample-web/ directory, compilation output or jar and library jar files.
sample files will setup a simple messaging destination and service to do basic testing.

Building and deploying in actionscript

To use the MuleRTMP endpoint in Flex you need to include the swc file provided in as3\MuleRTMPFlexLib\bin or build the MuleRTMPFlexLib project yourself.
The MuleRTMPChannel is still very basic.
